ads7828: TI ADS7828 I2C A/D Converter Driver

This library provides high-level functions for accessing the Texas Instruments ADS7828 I2C A/D Converter.

The basic specs of the ADS7828 are:

  • 12-bit results
  • 8 input channels
  • up to 50KHz conversion rate
  • External reference or internal 2.5V reference
